item.description:
Join us for an walk in the "Dog Park" park of the Arboretum in Jamaica Plain. We will meet at the Medum Street entrance and start with the 1 mile lap around the hill. We can extend the walk by either walking to the top of the hill where the dogs can play and we can admire the view, or we can explore other parts of the Arboretum with our dogs on their leashes.

More details and a map to follow!

group.name: The South Shore Dog Lovers Pack Walk

item.name: Peter's Hill at the Arnold Arboretum
